sentences.en: Air Screwdriver - The ergonomic design enable users to work long time without fatigue.
sentences.cn: EP3101螺丝起子 - 符合人体工学设计,长久使用不疲劳.

sentences.en: American Cub bottles Kai, a beautiful curve, ergonomic easy to open the beer cap.
sentences.cn: 美人鱼尾瓶启, 优美曲线, 符合人体工学轻松撬开啤酒瓶盖.

sentences.en: An ergonomic platform to lie on!
sentences.cn: 一人体工学平台,以谎言对!

sentences.en: Design peculiar May flower bottle opener beautiful curves, ergonomic easy to open the beer cap.
sentences.cn: 设计奇特,五月花开瓶器优美曲线, 符合人体工学轻松撬开啤酒瓶盖.

sentences.en: Ergonomic issues refer to operators continuously bending and stretching to locations to pick products for orders.
sentences.cn: 符合人体工程学的问题是指经营者不断弯曲和伸展的地点挑选产品的订单.

sentences.en: Ergonomic streamlining and soft cushioned back means applled comfort.
sentences.cn: 符合人体工程学:人体工学曲线,后饰柔韧,使用舒适.

sentences.en: Flying low vibration, cabin noise, ergonomic seat design to reduce pilot fatigue.
sentences.cn: 飞行振动低, 舱内噪音小, 人体工程学设计座椅减轻飞行员的疲劳.

sentences.en: From billing reports. From ergonomic keyboards.
sentences.cn: 掌控着营业报表和人体工程学键盘.

sentences.en: In the course of these new developments the design of the entire simulator equipment and the Instructor Operating Station (IOS) have been improved and adapted to ergonomic requirements.
sentences.cn: 在新的开发过程中，整个仿真设备和指令操作站（IOS）的设计经过了改善，满足人类环境改造学的要求。

sentences.en: Lead equipment and utility ergonomic assessment.
sentences.cn: 领导设施与设备的人机工程学评估.

sentences.en: Likewise the Solitude Bathtub has comfortable, ergonomic armrests.
sentences.cn: 同样孤独的浴缸有舒适, 符合人体工程学扶手.

sentences.en: Objective Basing on the need of cockpit ergonomic design, to set up a geometrical dummy.
sentences.cn: 目的基于飞机驾驶舱设计需要, 建立适合其工效分析用的人体几何模型.

sentences.en: Objective To an index system for ergonomic evaluation of cockpit display.
sentences.cn: 目的筛选出驾驶舱显示系统工效学评价指标.

sentences.en: PVC sheathed handle, beautiful and comfortable . Ergonomic feel with safe finger clearance.
sentences.cn: 手柄人性化设计,PVC浸塑,手感舒适, 美观.

sentences.en: Response for the ergonomic and comfort designing and developing.
sentences.cn: 负责整车人机工程的控制介面的设计开发工作.

sentences.en: The passenger is treated as an equal in this ergonomic balanced design.
sentences.cn: 在人机工程学上,乘客和驾驶员一样,都受到了细致的关怀.

phrases.tran_cn: 人因设计；工效学设计；人体工学设计
